name: General Litigation Practice
description: Templates for general litigation tasks including case analysis, client communications, and court filings

templates.description: Analyze case facts and legal issues to develop litigation strategy and identify key arguments.
Research applicable case law and statutory authority to support legal arguments and cite relevant precedent.
Draft correspondence to client regarding case status, legal advice, and next steps.
Prepare comprehensive case summary including facts, legal issues, and recommended strategy.
Review and analyze case documents to identify relevant evidence and potential issues.
Draft initial pleadings including complaint, answer, or other responsive documents.
Prepare comprehensive discovery plan including interrogatories, requests for production, and deposition strategy.
Draft settlement agreement including terms, conditions, and release provisions.
Prepare trial brief including statement of facts, legal arguments, and proposed jury instructions.
Draft appellate brief including statement of issues, legal arguments, and request for relief.
